stringified:
Index Of | string,searchValue,fromIndex | value | IMPLICIT | NONE
({ string, searchValue, fromIndex }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.indexOf(searchValue, fromIndex))

original.description: Returns the index within the calling String object of the first occurrence of the specified value, starting the search at fromIndex
original.runFnString:
({ string, searchValue, fromIndex }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.indexOf(searchValue, fromIndex))

alternativeFunction: function ({ inputString, searchValue, startIndex }, { result }) { result.next(inputString.indexOf(searchValue, startIndex)); }
alternativeMetaData: Substring Index | inputString, searchValue, startIndex | result | IMPLICIT | NONE
